name: Tropical Twister Smoothie
description: Take a trip to the tropics without leaving your kitchen! With plenty of fruit and a boost of superfood spinach, this bright smoothie is sure to please.

ingredients.name: Power Up Vanilla Protein Blend or Power Up Salted Caramel Protein Blend

preparation: In a blender, combine water, mango, pineapple, yogurt, and spinach. Using a citrus press, squeeze in juice from lime.
Add protein blend, blend until smooth, 30 sec.
Pour into a chilled glass and enjoy!
tips: Use coconut-based yogurt to make it dairy free and vegan.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 slice whole grain bread and 2 tsp nut butter.
